backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features affecting HeroSection.tsx with metadata and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for many frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode tokens, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry that loads the React app with SEO metadata and font preconnects.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring client-side routing and wrapping pages in AppLayout with an ErrorBoundary.
frontend/src/components/about/DividerFea: Renders a list of feature items separated by visual dividers.
frontend/src/components/about/TeamMember: Displays a team member entry with placeholder image area and text, supporting reversed layout.
frontend/src/components/common/NumberTic: Animated number counter triggered on scroll using an intersection observer.
frontend/src/components/common/PageTrans: Applies fade or fade‑slide transitions to page content with reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/common/RevealOnS: Scroll-triggered reveal animation wrapper supporting subtle or noticeable variants.
frontend/src/components/contact/ServiceS: Dropdown accordion allowing users to select a legal service, with state management and error styling.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component rendering a styled fallback UI with reload option on errors.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing contact info, social links, and smooth-scrolling quick links.
frontend/src/components/home/AboutApproa: About section describing the firm's overview and approach, including a learn‑more button and approach items.
FAQ accordion with toggleable questions and JSON‑LD schema generation for SEO.
frontend/src/components/home/FinalCtaSec: Call‑to‑action section prompting users to schedule a consultation, with decorative visuals and navigation.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Hero banner with background image and button that navigates or scrolls to the consultation form.
Responsive navbar with scroll detection, section navigation, mobile menu, and contact button.
frontend/src/components/home/HowItWorksS: Timeline‑based explanation of the legal process steps using custom timeline components.
frontend/src/components/home/PartnersMar: Animated marquee displaying partner cards in a looping scroll with gradient fade edges.
frontend/src/components/home/PartnersSec: Renders a partners section with a header and passes a static partner list to PartnersMarquee.
frontend/src/components/home/ServicesSec: Displays a grid of legal services with icons and navigation handlers for exploring services or contacting.
frontend/src/components/home/Testimonial: Implements an auto-scrolling testimonials carousel with manual navigation and responsive behavior.
Wraps a static testimonials list and renders it inside the TestimonialsCarousel with a section header.
frontend/src/components/home/TrustIntroS: Shows trust indicators with icons and animated number counters for experience and achievements.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides page layout with navbar, route-based scroll restoration, and page transition wrapper.
frontend/src/components/reui/timeline.ts: Re-exports a customizable timeline component set with context, orientation handling, and structural elements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading. Wraps AuthClient setup with customizable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useNumberTicker.ts: Implements an animated number ticker hook that counts smoothly to a target value when visible. Uses requestAnimationFrame with easing and resets when hidden.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook exposing actor and loading state from useActor. Intended for future backend query integrations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, typography, components, and light/dark mode styles. Includes layout utilities and custom classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider. Mounts the App component and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with firm values, team members, and feature highlights. Uses navigation handlers and several display components.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact/booking form with validation, submission simulation, and service selection. Displays contact info and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Composes the homepage from multiple sections wrapped in scroll-based reveal animations. Ends with a footer.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Shows a styled 404 page with navigation back to the homepage. Uses card and button UI components.
frontend/src/pages/servicesData.ts: Exports a list of service definitions with names, icons, and descriptions for rendering on the services page.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders the services page with a hero section, services grid from servicesData, and a CTA, using scroll reveal and navigation.
frontend/src/router/router.ts: Implements a simple client-side router with route registration, navigation, and subscription handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, fonts, plugins, and container settings for the project.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, features, and pending requests for updating the homepage hero background image.
